description:
As a LPA Planning Officer,
  I want to upload supplementary planning documents,
  so that it can form part of the evidence on which the Inspector makes a decision
name: Supplementary Planning Documents - Add Document

elements.name: AC1 LPA Planning Officer navigates to Add Supplementary planning document questions

steps.name: the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
the LPA Planning Officer is presented with add supplementary document questions

elements.name: AC2 LPA User successfully uploads "an adopted document"

steps.name: the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
the meta data is completed for "an adopted document"
progress is made to the supplementary document list

elements.name: AC2 LPA User successfully uploads "a not adopted document"

steps.name: the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
the meta data is completed for "a not adopted document"
progress is made to the supplementary document list

elements.name: AC3 LPA User does not upload document and provides relevant information for "an adopted document"

steps.name: the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
the meta data is completed for "an adopted document"
progress is halted with a message 'the file is missing'

elements.name: AC3 LPA User does not upload document and provides relevant information for "a not adopted document"

steps.name: the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
the meta data is completed for "a not adopted document"
progress is halted with a message 'the file is missing'

elements.name: AC4 LPA User does not upload document

steps.name: the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
the LPA Planning Officer is taken to the Task List

elements.name: AC5 LPA User selects invalid file size

steps.name: the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
progress is halted with a message the file 'upload_file_large.tiff' 'is too big'

elements.name: AC6 LPA User selects invalid file format

steps.name: the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
progress is halted with a message the file 'upload-file-invalid-wrong-type.csv' 'format is incorrect'

elements.name: AC7 LPA User does not enter file name

steps.name: the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
no file name has been entered
progress is halted with a message 'file name is missing'

elements.name: AC8 LPA User does not specify if it’s been adopted

steps.name: the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
formally adopted has not been selected
progress is halted with a message 'formally adopted not complete'

elements.name: AC9 LPA User selects it has been adopted but provides an invalid date ""-""-""

steps.name: the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
an invalid date of ""-""-"" is provided
progress is halted with an error "Tell us the date the supplementary planning document was adopted" which highlights "day,month,year"

elements.name: AC9 LPA User selects it has been adopted but provides an invalid date ""-""-"2022"

steps.name: the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
an invalid date of ""-""-"2022" is provided
progress is halted with an error "Date of adoption must include a day and month" which highlights "day,month"

steps.name: the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
an invalid date of ""-""-"2021" is provided
progress is halted with an error "Date of adoption must include a day and month" which highlights "day,month"
